page.title: 13ADULT EMPLOYMENT
page.content: drives a lot and every Friday he goes to Chippenham market.My dad gets home about 5:00 to 6:00.My mum also works but she works part time on Fridays and Tuesdays.Shes a teacher at west Lavington school.She teaches the head masters class and is a P.E. teacher as well.She leaves at 8:40 and gets back at 4:30 or 5:00. {by Beth Lowe} My dad is self-employed.His company is called 'Colin Watts Arable Services'. He sells fertilizers,seeds,pesticides, herbicides,fungicides and chemicals.He has loads of different kinds of grass seeds,and the're all named after the white horses of Wiltshire:Cherhill, Alton Barnes,Westbury,Pewsey,Devizes and Malborough.He was born on a farm, and he went to Lackham College of Agriculture,and studied as an Agronimst.(A person who tells farmers
